version_description:
Periodic Table Chemistry on iPadOS

Powerful new features
- Dark Mode
- Split View
- Slide Over

Added new Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese and Turkish.

Improved stability and bug fixes.
We release updates regularly, and we’re always looking for ways to make things better. If you have any feedback or run into issues, come find us in our website. We’re happy to help!
Chinese language has been temporarily removed, an apology for the inconvenience, we are fixing the problem.

· Enjoy new App Clip and Widgets.
· Bugs fixed.
